member.name: T:EdjCase.ICP.WebSockets.IWebSocketAgent`1
member.summary: Agent for the Internet Computer using websockets
member.typeparam: The type of the message that will be sent back and forth from client/server

member.name: M:EdjCase.ICP.WebSockets.IWebSocketAgent`1.ConnectAsync(System.Nullable{System.Threading.CancellationToken})
member.summary: Connects to the server with a websocket connection. Will update `State` property when connected
member.param: Optional. Cancellation token used to stop the network requests before completion

member.name: M:EdjCase.ICP.WebSockets.IWebSocketAgent`1.SendAsync(`0,System.Nullable{System.Threading.CancellationToken})
member.summary: Sends a message to the server via websockets
member.param: The message that should be sent to the server
Optional. Cancellation token used to stop the network requests before completion

member.name: M:EdjCase.ICP.WebSockets.IWebSocketAgent`1.ReceiveNextAsync(System.Nullable{System.Threading.CancellationToken})
member.summary: Gets the next message from the server and processes it with the defined callbacks
member.param: Optional. Cancellation token used to stop the network requests before completion

member.name: M:EdjCase.ICP.WebSockets.IWebSocketAgent`1.CloseAsync
member.summary: Closes the websocket connection. Will change the `State` property

member.name: P:EdjCase.ICP.WebSockets.IWebSocketAgent`1.State
member.summary: Indicates the current state of the websocket connection

member.name: P:EdjCase.ICP.WebSockets.IWebSocketAgent`1.IsConnectionEstablished
member.summary: Will return true if the `State` property is open, otherwise false

member.name: M:EdjCase.ICP.WebSockets.IWebSocketAgent`1.ReceiveAllAsync(System.Nullable{System.Threading.CancellationToken})
member.summary: Waits and receives all messages from the server until the connection is closed or the cancellation token is canceled
member.param: Optional. Cancellation token used to stop the loop and network requests before completion
